Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at O'Hare.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
